name: hellofriday
description: We created the platform for our own internal use. But it was so effective we had to put it out there. During the covid-era, Friday Media Group was struggling with the challenges of the changing work culture; remote employees, hybrid work models and teams scattered all over the world. Even the most modern HR platforms like CharlieHR and Bamboo could not meet our need of building a strong work community, organising internal events, maximum process automation and engaging the new generation of employees.
features: pursue growth and innovation for our platform, customers, and team.
operate with honesty, integrity, and transparency.
seek to create balance in life for our employees and customers.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity

enhanced_description: hellofriday is an HR platform designed to address the challenges of modern work culture, including remote and hybrid work models, and globally scattered teams. Initially developed for internal use by Friday Media Group during the COVID-era, it proved highly effective in building strong work communities, organizing internal events, maximizing process automation, and engaging new generations of employees, where traditional HR platforms like CharlieHR and Bamboo fell short. Positioned as 'The HR Platform for the Employee, Powered by the Employee,' it aims to be an all-in-one, easy-to-use system with an intuitive user experience for seamless navigation, ultimately bridging the gap between employees and business goals for organizational alignment.
